content: (Basic questionâ€”not very used to github!) Let's say I have a branch on which I've implemented one feature, but it hasn't been merged yet. I want to have another branch where I can put a new feature which depends on my first feature. How should I do this? A subbranch of the first branch, another branch on mathlib4 that somehow refers to the first, just implement it in the same branch and have one big PR, or something else...?
I would just branch off the feature branch. Then when you make a new PR, list the original as a dependency.
Ok, thanks! Just to make I've got it right, this means implementing the new feature on a subbranch of the first feature's branch, right?
Thomas Murrills has marked this topic as resolved.
